Class Item

  • java.lang.Object
    • Item

  • public class Item
extends java.lang.Object
    Class Item - a item in an game. This class is part of the "Fly-Away" application. "Fly-Away" is a very simple, text based adventure game. A "Item" represents one object in a room or backpack. Every item has a name, weight, whether item can be picked and type & cost.
    Version:
    18.03.15
    Author:
    733474
